modules.description: This module creates and manages interactive image display windows with customizable input handling. It works with image data in RGB or RGBA formats and supports operations like updating displayed images, capturing mouse and keyboard events, and retrieving cursor positions. Concrete use cases include visualizing image processing results in real time and building interactive image editing tools.

This module creates and manages OpenGL textures for displaying images using GLFW. It provides functions to initialize a texture from an image and render it to a window. The module works directly with image data structures and OpenGL texture parameters.

This module displays images using OpenGL and GLFW, providing functions to create textures and interactive windows for real-time visualization. It works with RGB and RGBA image data, supporting operations like image rendering, input event handling, and cursor tracking. Concrete use cases include visualizing image processing pipelines and building interactive image editing interfaces.
